title: Bug 18116Compare view does not inherit Java editor background color
description: Bug 18116Compare view does not inherit Java editor background color f1 build.
OB: Cannot use compare view if Java editor background (not from thesystem color scheme!) See white text on white backround, in other words text is not readable.
SR: is black and text is white.Steps to reproduce.1. Set Java editor background to black2. Set color for "others" to white3. Make sure you have local history for a java file4. From file context menu choose Compare withlocal history. Pick anyversion available.5.
